attributes.long-description:
Guide your shimmering blob of liquid metal through a crazy cartoon world full of tricky traps and devious devices. The aim is simple: Progress through a series of wacky labs, avoid the dangers and escape without spilling your precious mercury.
• New Wireless Multiplayer Modes
• Hidden Labs & Party Games
• Tutorial Mode & Playground
• Free Look & Replay Modes
• Game Share
• 1-2 Players
• Memory Stick Duo™ 832 KB
• Wi-Fi Compatible (Ad Hoc). Internet connection may be required for certain Wi-Fi functionality. Player responsible for Wi-Fi fees.

© 2006 Ignition Entertainment. All rights reserved. Ignition is a registered trademark and Mercury Meltdown is a registered trademark of Ignition Entertainment. Developed by Ignition Entertainment Ltd.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Mercury Meltdown®
